pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 7, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Calgary, Alberta

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Member of Parliament Kent Hehrâ€™s Annual Stampede Breakfast.

Sunalta Community Centre
1627 10 Avenue South West

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:20 a.m.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Calgary Stampede.

Stampede Park

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for accredited media
    • Accredited media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. at the West Side of the Stampede Ticket Office
    • Media who have not been accredited with the Stampede can contact Zach Robertson (zrobertson@calgarystampede.com)
